name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makima’s Poolside Elegance Live Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Makima’s elegance by the poolside with this live wallpaper, featuring dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Makima in a graceful poolside setting, radiating elegance and power.
Minimalist Design: Clean and stylish interface for smooth browsing.
Clock and Date: Convenient time and date display to stay organized.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instant access to your favorite websites.
Google Search Bar: Fast and efficient search functionality.
More Extension: Expand your browsing experience with additional features.
